text: What if the last glimmering city of Atlantis was just there beneath the waves? Picture this, scholars, warriors, falling into chaos as Earth trembles and seas rage. Was it nature's fury or the spark of war that sent Atlantis into the depths? Now, imagine you're there feeling the ground shake, hearing the screams. But wait, what if it's all happening right now? Echoes of the past or prophecy of our future? Don't just imagine, uncover the mystery with me. And subscribe for more secrets from the depths.
